matrix
Class USB1Mat

java.lang.Object
  matrix.Mat
      matrix.SMat
          matrix.USB1Mat

public class USB1Mat
extends SMat

Class for upper-symmetric-banded matrix stored in 1D array (USB1).

Author:
Murat Artim
